Package com.intellij.ui.tree.project

Class ProjectFileNodeUpdater

extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProjectFileNodeUpdater

        public ProjectFileNodeUpdater(Project project,
                              Invoker invoker)

    • Method Detail

      • updateFromRoot

        public void updateFromRoot()
        Notifies that project roots are changed. The onInvokerThread(boolean) method will be executed with a small delay after calling of this method.
        See Also:
        getUpdatingDelay()

      • updateFromFile

        public void updateFromFile(VirtualFile file)
        Notifies that the specified file (or folder) is changed. The onInvokerThread(boolean) method will be executed with a small delay after last calling of this method, i.e. a bunch of modified files will be reported together.
        Parameters:
        file - a modified virtual file
        See Also:
        getUpdatingDelay()

      • updateFromElement

        public void updateFromElement(PsiElement element)
        Notifies that the specified PSI element is changed. If this element corresponds to a virtual file, it will be marked as changed.
        Parameters:
        element - a modified PSI element
        See Also:
        updateFromFile(com.intellij.openapi.vfs.VirtualFile)

      • updateImmediately

        public void updateImmediately(java.lang.Runnable onDone)
        Notifies that all collected files should be reported as soon as possible. Usually, it is needed to find an added file in a tree right after adding.

      • getUpdatingDelay

        protected int getUpdatingDelay()
        Returns:
        a delay between an event and the onInvokerThread(boolean) method calling, that is used to collect a bunch of changes

      • updateStructure

        protected abstract void updateStructure(boolean fromRoot,
                                        java.util.Set<? extends VirtualFile> updatedFiles)
        This method is called on invoker's thread to report changes in virtual files.
        Parameters:
        fromRoot - true if roots are changed
        updatedFiles - a set of modified files
